abstract: North Carolina State Board of Elections orders recount of Durham county votes in effort to resolve contested governor's election; acts under pressure from Republican Gov Pat McCrory, who has declined to concede despite consistently trailing his opponent, Democratic state Atty Gen Roy Cooper.

headline.print_headline: Partial Recount Ordered in North Carolina Race
headline.main: Partial Recount Ordered in North Carolina Governor’s Race

snippet: The State Board of Elections ordered a recount of roughly 94,000 votes in Durham County, a move that could help resolve Gov. Pat McCrory’s race for re-election....
lead_paragraph: The State Board of Elections ordered a recount of roughly 94,000 votes in Durham County, a move that could help resolve Gov. Pat McCrory’s race for re-election.
